text: Moromuoa ea le phetelang Lits’enolo tsa Allah tse nang le manollo e hlakileng, hore a tle a etelle pele ba-kholoang le hona ho etsa liketso tse lokileng, ho tsoa Lefifing a ba lebise Leseling. Ba-kholoang ho Allah le hona ho etsa liketso tse lokileng, Allah U tla ba amohella kahar’a Lirapa tseo linoka li phallang ka tlasa tsona; ho phela kamoo kahosafeleng. Ebile Allah U ba hlophiselitse moputso o babatsehang
